hero.description: JustDocIt is a 100% online platform that documents your code with a single click. Connect your GitHub repository, select your programming language, and get professional documentation ready to share.

features.title: Everything you need, from your browser

github.title: GitHub Connection
github.description: Connect your GitHub account and access all your repositories without complex configurations or local cloning.

online.title: 100% Online
online.description: No installations, no local setup. The entire process happens on our servers and results are delivered instantly in your browser.

languages.title: Multiple Languages
languages.description: Supports Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, C#, PHP, Ruby, Go, Rust, Swift, Kotlin and more, all from the same intuitive interface.

quality.title: Quality Analysis
quality.description: Receive metrics about your documentation quality and suggestions to improve it directly in your browser.

deploy.title: Instant Deployment
deploy.description: Generate a public URL to share your documentation or keep it private just for your team. All without leaving your browser.

collaboration.title: Real-time Collaboration
collaboration.description: Work with your team simultaneously on documentation, with collaborative editing and change control.

step1.additional: without needing to install additional applications.

step2.additional: without needing to download it to your local machine.

step4.additional: with internet connection, without additional installations.

step1.title: Connect your GitHub account
step1.description: Sign in with your GitHub account and authorize JustDocIt to access your repositories.
step1.highlight: Everything is done through secure OAuth

step2.title: Select your repository
step2.description: Choose the repository you want to document. Our servers analyze the code

step3.title: Configure your preferences
step3.description: Select the programming language, documentation style, and display options.
step3.highlight: All from an intuitive web interface

step4.title: Generate and share
step4.description: With a single click, our servers generate the documentation and provide you with a public URL to share.

cta.title: Document your code today
cta.description: Join thousands of developers who trust JustDocIt to create professional documentation without leaving the browser. No installations, no complications.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.addProjectMessage: Add a new project to start working.

documentation.title: Project Documentation Guide
documentation.subtitle: Learn how to document your code effectively in different programming languages

guide.title: Usage Guide
guide.description: Learn how to use Just Doc It and its main features

howToUse.title: How to Use Just Doc It?
howToUse.explanation: Follow these steps to start documenting your code professionally.

connect.title: Connect your Repository
connect.description: Authenticate with GitHub to access your public and private repositories.

select.title: Select Language
select.description: Choose between TypeScript, JavaScript, or Java to see specific documentation examples.

learn.title: Learn Best Practices
learn.description: Explore detailed examples of how to document classes, interfaces, methods, and more.

generate.title: Generate Documentation
generate.description: Apply what you've learned to your code and generate professional documentation automatically.

features.title: Main Features
features.explanation: Discover the features that make Just Doc It the perfect tool for your documentation.

multiLanguage.title: Multi-language
multiLanguage.description: Support for TypeScript, JavaScript, and Java

github.title: GitHub Integration
github.description: Access and document your repositories directly

realtime.title: Real-time Updates
realtime.description: Your documentation stays synchronized with your code
